dialogues: The Crystals of Light have been scattered...
Find them before the shadows consume Aurelia.

levels.name: Forest of Beginnings
introDialogue: The spirits are slow, but they follow your steps.
endDialogue: But shadows grow restless in the caves...

levels.name: Caves of Shadows
introDialogue: The caves whisper in the dark.
Spirits here move faster. Keep your distance.
endDialogue: The ruins await... guarded by stronger shadows.

levels.name: Ruins of Aurelia
introDialogue: The shadows hunt in numbers. Stay swift.

dialogues: With the Crystals of Light restored, Aurelia is safe.
